item.title: Conquering Democracy, Abolishing Political Representation
item.description: The argues that Communist society will require an overcoming of political representation in favor of forms of direct democracy like sortition and referendum. Read By: Will Intro Music: ворожное озеро Гроза vwqp remix Outro... Feed: https://feeds.libsyn.com/193682/rss

item.title: E58 - Quick Update From Dave on all things UpCycle Canada
item.description:
E58 - Quick Update From Dave

Dave here!  Just jumping on to give you a quick update on UpCycle Canada.

Our next chapter for the business now that the store has been closed, our new retail space at the Niagara Flea Market, and a quick update on our podcast plans

Great to connect with you!  Jen and I will be back with you again on a regular basis very soon!

https://www.mackaycandlecompany.com/
